modName: Constant Looping Horse Breathing Sound Removed
summary: Removes the looping horse breath sound that is of great annoyance when in dialogue or a menu near to your horse.
descriptionHtml:
All this mod does is remove the repetitive/looping sound of the horse breathing.

It doesn't remove all of the horse breathing sounds, just that really really annoying one that is most noticeable when you are in a menu or dialogue after jumping off your horse.

It is an .esp file that needs to be extracted into the Skyrim>Data folder or installed using Nexus Mod Manager.
author: zyg0tic
